title: SET_HOVER_MODE_WING_RATIO
content:
0x70A252F60A3E036B// SetHoverModeWingRatio
void SET_HOVER_MODE_WING_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, float ratio);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to which the ratio will be applied.ratio: Between 0.0 and 1.0. 0.0 is wings closed, 1.0 is wings open.This native allows opening or closing the wings of the Deluxo/Oppressor. For the Deluxo, wing deployment depends on sufficient altitude.Old name:  _SET_SPECIALFLIGHT_WING_RATIOExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- In this case we are opening the wings of the vehicle
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
SetHoverModeWingRatio(vehicle, 1.0)
codeBlocks:
// SetHoverModeWingRatio
void SET_HOVER_MODE_WING_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, float ratio);

-- In this case we are opening the wings of the vehicle
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
SetHoverModeWingRatio(vehicle, 1.0)
